items.name: Adjustable Kitchen Drawer Organizer
items.keyProblem: messy, cluttered kitchen drawers where utensils get tangled and lost

source.notes: Strong before/after visual potential, solves daily frustration

items.name: Over-the-Cabinet Trash Bag Holder
items.targetUser: home cooks who want fast cleanup
items.keyProblem: no easy way to hang trash bags while cooking, bags fall or get in the way

source.notes: Simple solution to common kitchen problem

items.name: Portable Mini Bag Sealer
items.targetUser: snack eaters and families with kids
items.keyProblem: open food bags get stale quickly, wasting food and money

source.notes: Prevents food waste, clear value proposition

items.name: Reusable Stretch Silicone Lids
items.keyProblem: plastic wrap wastes money and creates trash, doesn't seal well

items.name: Under Cabinet Jar Opener
items.targetUser: people with weak grip, arthritis sufferers, seniors
items.keyProblem: tight jar lids are frustrating and painful to open, can cause injury

source.notes: Solves real pain point, excellent reviews
